title: What's happening in Norway?
content:
Hello.

I'm working on some English posters for an event in Oslo and I'd like to make some local references if I can find something suitable. I've looked very quickly and I can't see a lot pointing in that direction.  
Does anyone have a link or something interesting to share. What's going on up there? Any Ideas?

Thanks.
author: James Eden

comments.content:
There's a Norwegian gentleman over in General Discussions who started a thread called Where are the women?

Perhaps he could help you…

peace
Ah, OK… There's a terrible echo in here.
